Hero.title: Advancing High Energy Physics at UCN
Hero.subtitle: Weekly talks, discussions, and paper reading sessions fostering collaboration in particle physics.

About.title: About the Journal Club
About.text: A community space at Universidad Católica del Norte dedicated to the discussion of High Energy Physics, cosmology, and beyond the Standard Model research.

Join.text: Interested in presenting or attending? Contact us or sign up below.
